text: Look at what the media's "perfect scenario" for the COVID-19 Response would've been- they would've said 'Donald Trump, during a senate impeachment trial, sent all the senators home to shelter in place'.....could you imagine the reaction if @realdonaldtrump  would've done this? https://t.co/Vm0eoY2y5x
